Hero.title: Transforming Ideas into Masterpieces
Hero.description2: Discover a world of creativity and skill with our expert in tattoos. Whether it's a classic design or something completely unique, we turn your ideas into stunning reality. Start your journey today.

Welcome.heading: Welcome to My Tattoo Portfolio
Welcome.subheading: Discover my unique tattoo designs and artistry.

portfolioItems.title: Japanese Dragon
portfolioItems.description: A fierce dragon tattoo inspired by Japanese folklore.

portfolioItems.title: Traditional Anchor

portfolioItems.title: Butterfly and Flowers

About.title: Welcome to Mario's Studio
About.description: With over 3 years of experience, I specialize in creating custom tattoos that reflect your unique style and personality. Every tattoo is a masterpiece, crafted with passion and dedication.

services.title: Custom Designs
services.description: Unique and personalized tattoo designs tailored to your preferences.

services.title: Tattoo Aftercare Tips
services.description: Learn essential tips and products to care for your new tattoo and ensure it heals beautifully.

services.title: Consultations for New Ideas
services.description: Discuss your tattoo ideas with our skilled artists for creative advice.

testimonials.text: Working with Mario was an incredible experience. Their attention to detail and creative vision turned my tattoo idea into a work of art!
testimonials.author: Client 1

testimonials.text: Highly recommend Mario for anyone looking for top-notch tattoo work. Professional, friendly, and extremely talented!
testimonials.author: Client 2

Action.heading: Schedule Your Consultation
Action.paragraph: Thanks for visiting our website. We're excited to help you bring your tattoo ideas to life.
